resources.string: The most popular program for international cultural exchange
Opportunity to spend the summer in the USA and immerse yourself in the country is culture
Chance to make friends from different countrie
Job options : supermarket, swimming pools, water parks, hotels, cafes and restaurants
Chance to make friends from different countrie
The travel period lasts no more than 30 days from the end of work. You can travel to all states on your own or with the help of travel agents
